Description: Al Gassim Investment Holding  Co (known as: Gaco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Gaco operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Agricultural Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Gaco is based in Qassim, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1984.
